data.name: Hedgehot - Battle Strike
data.detailed_description:
Hedgehot - Battle Strike : Cards in which reside magical creatures are used to challenge other users and pave a way to the top.


Hedgehot - Battle Strike is a 1 versus 1 Card Game similar to the likes of Heartstone or Runeterra, where using your cards, brain and stamina, you try to defeat your opponent and bring their life points to 0.

Features :
  • Friendly Battle - Invite your friends in a lobby to challenge them to prove your skills.
  • Online MatchMaking - Find or create a lobby for random players around the world to challenge you. Best place to refine your skills.
  • Deck Builder - Choose your favorite cards to challenge others with.
  • Shop - Purchase cards to upgrade your deck and create the best possible Meta.


Community :
You may join the Hedgehot - Battle Strike official discord to find other battlers and a place to share your experience! https://discord.gg/j9QHNq8QaM
